title: Genomic Data
description: JSON schema for Genomic Data POJO

numSamples.description: Approximate number of samples in this Data
numSamples.title: Number of Samples

species.description: The species associated with this Data
species.title: Species

technology.description: The technology used to generate the data; for example, microarray, sequencing, massSpec, etc.
technology.title: Technology

dataType.description: The type of data being generated; for example, Gene Expression, Copy Number Variation, Methylation, Genotypes
dataType.title: dataType

molecularFeatureType.description: The molecule being assayed; for example, DNA, RNA or Protein
molecularFeatureType.title: Molecule

tissue.description: Type of tissue for the samples in this Data. Tissue is described by the Synapse ontology concept: http://synapse.sagebase.org/ontology#11171
tissue.title: Tissue

platform.description: Chip platform for the samples in this Data. Platform is described by the Synapse ontology concept: http://synapse.sagebase.org/ontology#12591
platform.title: Platform
